content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK (
            'https://azureadlsdev1.dfs.core.windows.net/preparezone/already*.csv',
            'https://azureadlsdev1.dfs.core.windows.net/struckzone/already*.csv'
        ),
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS locatorexists
 ORDER by location3
